function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of implementation of external shading and evaporative cooling strategies in residential buildings in hot arid climate","Impact":"High energy consumption and increased electricity usage","Mitigation":"Implement external shading and evaporative cooling strategies more extensively","Technologies":"Solar shading devices, evaporative coolers","People":"Occupants of residential buildings","Owner":"Architects, building designers"},{"Description":"Trend towards culturally and climatically responsive designs may not be sufficient to reduce energy consumption","Impact":"Continued high energy consumption despite adoption of responsive designs","Mitigation":"Investigate occupant behavior and address possible poor workmanship in construction","Technologies":"Building energy management systems, energy-efficient appliances","People":"Owners, occupants, construction workers","Owner":"Architects, building designers, construction companies"},{"Description":"Potential poor workmanship in construction of residential units","Impact":"Increased energy consumption due to construction defects","Mitigation":"Conduct thorough inspections during construction and address any poor workmanship issues","Technologies":"Building inspection technologies, construction quality management software","People":"Construction workers, building inspectors","Owner":"Construction companies, building inspectors"}]}
